title: Caroline's Treasures 8958DDM Abstract Flowers Purple and Yellow Dish Drying Mat, Absorbent Dish Drying Mat Pad for Kitchen Counter Dish Drainer Mat for Countertop,
features: Premium Quality: Our Dish Drying Mat is crafted with a water-absorbent polyester face that quickly and efficiently absorbs moisture, keeping your countertops dry and free from water stains.

Enhanced Drying Performance: The middle layer features a polyurethane foam insert, designed to enhance airflow and promote faster drying. It's perfect for air drying a wide range of items, including dishes, glasses, stemware, silverware, pots, pans, bottles, fruits, and vegetables.

Generous Size: Measuring 14 inches x 22 inches, our mat is designed to fit most counters and can easily slide under most dish drying racks. It provides ample space for drying multiple items simultaneously, saving you time and effort. Stylish Artwork: The front side of the mat showcases beautiful artwork, adding a touch of elegance to your kitchen decor. It's not only functional but also visually appealing.

Non-Slip Design: Our absorbent drying mat features a non-slip backing, providing stability and preventing it from sliding on your countertop. It ensures your dishes and other items stay securely in place while they dry. Easy to Clean and Durable: This mat is machine washable, making it convenient to maintain its cleanliness and freshness. It's highly durable and built to withstand repeated use without losing its effectiveness.

Great gifts: Great hostess gifts, a housewarmning gift for that new home or a wedding gift for that new couple. All of our products feature artwork from one of our artists and desingers. A great gift for your dog walker, groomer, or pet sitter. We even have great teacher's gifts. Machine Washable and highly durable
description: Tired of setting dishes on an old towel? Well fret no more when you set your eyes on this decorative dish mat! It measures 14 inches x 21 inches and features a water-absorbent polyester face, polyurethane foam insert, polyester mesh lining and a binding edge finish. Add a touch of flair and functionality to the kitchen by ordering yours today!
